block_comment: This block of code is used to generate a specific data pattern based on the number of data query pins and a predefined data pattern. If the number of data query pins equals 80 and if the data pattern is either "DGEN_NEIGHBOR", "DGEN_WALKING1", "DGEN_WALKING0", or "DGEN_ALL", the block of code executes a process on the positive edge of an input clock signal.
